div.p: (Paid for the?) assessment of the eighth indiction of te - - - through the representa board of the village, for the gratuity of the - - -: one gold solidus less three car:total 1 gld. sol. less 3 c. in all, through the representatives of the village. They agree. Isakis has written on their behalf in the 8th indiction. â€ Peeus, tax-collector, agrees. Josepis agrees. Phibios agrees. Joseph. Translation: P.Leid.Inst. 1 77
